attributes.action: Organise a state funeral for the last first world war vetran to represent all that fell in the great war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As someone who is not associated in any way with the forces. Who was born well after the end of World war 2. Who's family lost no one close in either the first or second world war. I would like to petition that the last vetran in the first world war to die is given a state funeral to represent & give thanks to the millions who lost their lives to give me and my family the freedoms we now enjoy

rejection.details: This office outlined the Government's position on this matter very recently in response to a similar petition - please see: http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17937
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
